title: A Guide to Git Merging and Rebasing
summary: In this post we talk about the surprisingly controversial topic of git rebasing and merging. We discuss ,erging and rebasing in turn, what they are, why you would choose one over the other, and how to go about using each of them as a tutorial.

title: Writing this Blog
summary: In the first post on this blog, we discuss how this blog came to being, why I decided to write it, what technology choices I made and why, what my experiences were and what I hope to do with this.
